sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import currecyFormatter from "currency-formatter" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" const Home = () => { const {products} = useSelector(state => state.ProducerReducer); return (
{products.map(product => (
{product.name}
{product.price} currecyFormatter.format({product.price} , {})
{product.discount}
))}
) } export default Home
